ygData.subject: Re: a bit off topc but maybe not...
ygData.msgSnippet: That is a Myth.  You cannot combine a Runed Totem Staff and a Skull.  The skull can be placed in your 2nd hand if you are not using a 2h weapon.  This will
ygData.messageBody:
That is a Myth. You cannot combine a Runed Totem Staff and a Skull. The skull can be placed in your 2nd hand if you are not using a 2h weapon. This will increase your mana by 20 and SV by 3 I belive..

Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Aura Dracul [SMTP:auradracul@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 3:00 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] a bit off topc but maybe not...

From: "Aura Dracul" <auradracul@...>

Any of you spellcasters out there know what skull, you need to combine with
a Ruined totem staff...and what NPC combines them for you?

Sorry its a bit off topic..but I think that it's important to anyone who has
a runined totem staf..it makes em even better!...allthough, how better is
yet to be seen.

Auraelle
E'ci Server
